1.title: Part 1
1.plot: James Pennywhistle, the #1 self-proclaimed conspiracy theorist from Europe, is tackling America's most requested conspiracy of all - Whatever happened to The Bad Mamajuanas?

2.title: Part 2
2.plot: The Bad Mamajuanas time-travel to 2007 and steal their first hit single from the popular New Zealand-based music duo, Flight of the Conchords.

imdb.plot outline: How far will someone go to create the perfect music album? For international superstars The Bad Mamajuanas, the answer is simple: steal the greatest hits from other artists and claim them as your own. The only way to do that without getting caught however is to rewrite the past and remake the future by using time-travel, which apparently they have at their disposal. Sounds far-fetched? Not for one TV host who is hell-bent on tracking them down.
imdb.title: The Bad Mamajuanas
plot: In April of 1982, three prolific music-stealing lip-synchers disappeared while travelling backwards and forwards in time. 35 years later, VHS copies of their performances were found.::Anonymous

How far will someone go to create the perfect music album? For international superstars _The Bad Mamajuanas_ (qv), the answer is simple: steal the greatest hits from other artists and claim them as your own. The only way to do that without getting caught however is to rewrite the past and remake the future by using time-travel, which apparently they have at their disposal. Sounds far-fetched? Not for one TV host who is hell-bent on tracking them down.::Anonymous
